com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query.graph

Class GraphCentricQueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query.graph.GraphCentricQueryBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TitanGraphQuery<GraphCentricQueryBuilder>, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.GraphQuery, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Query

    public class GraphCentricQueryBuilder
extends Object
implements TitanGraphQuery<GraphCentricQueryBuilder>
    Builds a TitanGraphQuery, optimizes the query and compiles the result into a GraphCentricQuery which is then executed through a QueryProcessor.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Query

      • describeForVertices

        public QueryDescription describeForVertices()
        Description copied from interface: TitanGraphQuery
        Returns a description of this query for vertices as a QueryDescription object. This can be used to inspect the query plan for this query. Note, that calling this method does not actually execute the query but only optimizes it and constructs a query plan.
        Specified by:
        describeForVertices in interface TitanGraphQuery<GraphCentricQueryBuilder>
        Returns:
        A description of this query for vertices

      • describeForEdges

        public QueryDescription describeForEdges()
